name: Life's A Lich
description:
This is a Videogame project made within about 7 weeks total as a game demo.

New Updates soon!

The game is played with an Xbox controller!

Link: none 

Life's A Lich Credits 

3D Artists: Elliot Hallberg & Kristoffer French-Skog 

Animation: Eddie Gustafsson & Olof Aldsjö 

Game Design: Elias Albrektsson 

Game Writing: Mathias Arancibia Mena 

Music: Markus Alfredsson 

Programmers: Alexander Andersson & Felix Wilson 

Sound Designer: Markus Adbring 

Thank you, everyone, for the great work!
